text: Joyce C. Hearn (née Camp; June 16, 1929 – January 20, 2021) was an American politician and businesswoman. She was a member of the South Carolina House of Representatives as a Republican Party.South Carolina Legislature-Joyce C. Hearn Hearn was born in Cedartown, Georgia. Hearn died on January 20, 2021 in Columbia, South Carolina at the age of 91.Joyce C. title: Joyce Hearn
